overview.summary: This module builds the Finite Element Method stiffness matrix.

section.title: Module Description
section.p: This module builds the Finite Element Stiffness matrix for a certain field. It will assume the data on the field will describe the conductivity of the medium. Current there are two ways of specifying a conductivity for a domain. One can use the values assigned to the field as scalar isotropic conductivities or as tensor anisotropic ocnductivities. The second method is to attach a conductivity table to the module. In this case the values in the field are assumed to be indices into the conductivity table. The conductivity table is a m by 6 matrix or a n by 9 matrix depending on how many coefficients of the symmetric tensor are given. The module is also able use a different node ordering in the computational space. For this one should add a GeomToComp mapping matrix. This mapping matrix lays out how the geometrical space is mapped into the comptutational space.
